content.question: Which of the following best exemplifies population momentum?

choices.label: Continued growth of a population after fertility drops to replacement level
Continued growth of a population due to emigration
Decreased population due to increase in the death rate
Decreased population due to a reduced death rate and an increased fertility rate
Growth of a population after the fertility rate doubles

content.answer: Continued growth of a population after fertility drops to replacement level

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
